attributes.action: Unequivocally exit the EU with no deal and on WTO rules on April 12th 2019
attributes.additional_details:
The EU withdrawal bill and political declaration have been rejected in 2 meaningful votes.
The withdrawal deal has been rejected once.
In the first round of indicative votes all 8 options were rejected
In the second round of indicative votes all 4 options were rejected.

It is now time to leave the EU as per UK Law on 12th April 2019 on WTO terms with No Deal.  The PM should also step down  and a new PM be selected from the current government to lead us into appropriate trade negotiations
attributes.background: With the EU withdrawal deal and political declaration being rejected 3 times and following 2 rounds of indicative votes where all alternatives have been rejected by parliament, it is now time to end the incessant bickering in the House of Commons and just leave the EU as per UK law on the 12th April
